unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide use is too much, no? Even in Kerala, back home! Farmers near my village use so much. Remember that Onam sadhya last year? Everyone got a little stomach ache! We need better training, maybe through IARI, for safer use. What do you guys think about organic farming? Is it feasible for smaller farms in UP, near Kanpur, given the investment and all? Rs. 50,000 is a lot!
